{{About|the Voice-Overs used prior to [[Version 1.3]]|those used currently|Barbara/Voice-Overs}}

==Story==
{{VO
|character           = Barbara

|vo_01_01_title      = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello (1.0).ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = Tada! *giggles* Barbara is here~ Leave the healing to me, I will not disappoint you!

|vo_02_01_title      = Chat: Sleepiness
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Sleepiness (1.0).ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = *yawn* All this standing around is making me so sleepy...
|vo_02_02_title      = Chat: Encouragement
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Encouragement (1.0).ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = Everyone is working super hard, we should be too!
|vo_02_03_title      = Chat: Keeping One Refreshed
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Keeping One Refreshed (1.0).ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = Are you tired? Try my new spicy energy drink, I'm sure it'll wake you up!

<!-- Weather -->
|vo_03_01_title      = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains (1.0).ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = Don't stay out in the rain for too long, you'll catch a cold!
|vo_03_02_title      = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes (1.0).ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = Whoa!
|vo_03_03_title      = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows (1.0).ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = Ooh, snowflakes! Look at them dance!
|vo_03_04_title      = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out (1.0).ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = This weather is so amazing! I could burst into song.
|vo_03_05_title      = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing (1.0).ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = Don't worry! I will not... be blown away!

|vo_04_01_title      = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning (1.0).ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = Morning~ Let's do our best today.
|vo_04_02_title      = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon (1.0).ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = Oh? You want to hear me sing...? Sorry, the show is... It hasn't started yet.
|vo_04_03_title      = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening (1.0).ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = I really want to eat some spicy squid at [[Good Hunter]]... but my stomach, er... Never mind...
|vo_04_04_title      = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night (1.0).ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = We had a great day today! Get some rest.

|vo_05_01_title      = About {name}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} (1.0).ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = "To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward. When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil. When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back..." ...Oops, my apologies, I was just doing my prayers. *giggles* You need something?

|vo_06_01_title      = About Us: Hopes
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Hopes (1.0).ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = My dream is to bring a smile to the faces of all the people in my life! As long as I can help you on your journey, I'm happy~
|vo_06_02_title      = About Us: Dreams
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Dreams (1.0).ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = Thank you for being with me for all this time, I can feel that I'm getting closer to my dream. Hope we can keep this up in the future~!

|vo_07_01_title      = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision (1.0).ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = Everyone has their own desires. To bring together and fulfill those desires and make everyone happy &mdash; this is the purpose my Archon has bestowed upon me.
|vo_07_02_title      = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share (1.0).ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = I could never get bored of the breathtakingly beautiful nature that surrounds [[Mondstadt]]. I've heard that there are blue trees that exist by the sea shore near [[Inazuma City]]. I just need to save up a little more, and... What's that? You want to know what I'm saving up for? *chuckles* That's my little secret.
|vo_07_03_title      = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things (1.0).ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = Sunflowers always face the sun. They're so bright. In fact, my [[Frederica Gunnhildr|mother]] sent me a sunflower-style dress... I wonder when I'll finally get to wear it on stage?

|vo_08_01_title      = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = Acting Grand Master... Leader of the [[Knights of Favonius]]... Everyone seems to like her a lot. Oh? Me? I... Of course I have nothing but admiration for her!
|vo_08_02_title      = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = I always take good care of Lisa. If she ever wants to become a star, she'll have my unconditional support, I'll cheer at the top of my lungs until my voice goes hoarse... Hmm, that might scare off her other fans though...
|vo_08_03_title      = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = I've seen Amber rushing out of Mondstadt on a mission countless times. Being an Outrider doesn't look easy.
|vo_08_04_title      = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = Oh, Master Diluc? Last time, when I was performing at [[Angel's Share]], he kept frowning... Maybe he doesn't like my singing?
|vo_08_05_title      = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = Venti's voice is amazing! But the songs he sings and the ones I'm good at are very different. I tried to learn them but... the melodies are just so complicated.
|vo_08_06_title      = About [[Bennett]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Bennett (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = Bennett always comes to the Cathedral covered in scrapes and bruises... Though it clearly never bothers him a bit, given the big grin he always has on his face. He really should take better care of himself.
|vo_08_07_title      = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = My father left on the expedition with Grand Master Varka... I hope they are okay. Oh, what am I worried about? The Grand Master is none other than the Knight of Boreas, of course they will be fine! Still, I will be sure to pray for their safe return.
|vo_08_08_title      = About [[Rosaria]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Rosaria (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = Sister Rosaria is hard to get to know, especially given she never joins in on prayers, but... Oh, I'm sure she believes in the [[Barbatos|Anemo Archon]]! Although, I still don't really have the courage to try to talk to her...
|vo_08_08_mention    = Barbatos
|vo_08_09_title      = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle (1.0).ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = Noelle is just the cutest! She's so kind and patient, you just feel totally relaxed when you're around her. ...Oh yeah, and she makes the tastiest snacks! Best part is, they're also healthy. Tee-hee!

|vo_09_01_title      = More About {name}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = Knights look so cool when they swing their sword in combat! Don't you think so? I tried using a sword before but... *sigh* Uh, let's just say I have zero talent with a sword.
|vo_09_02_title      = More About {name}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = I want to heal everyone. This simple thought was all the motivation I needed to become a Deaconess. As long as I'm able to help everyone, I'll be content.
|vo_09_03_title      = More About {name}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = Being an idol, I learned from [[Alice]] that "A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people..." Yes, I completely agree.
|vo_09_04_title      = More About {name}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = I'm doing my best everyday... I hope my efforts earn the trust of the people of Mondstadt.
|vo_09_05_title      = More About {name}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05 (1.0).ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = Every time I get on stage I always start to doubt myself &mdash; can I really heal every person in Mondstadt? But I look at you now, and I feel that as long as we keep marching forward, maybe one day I might just&mdash; Huh? I've already healed you? Well, one's not enough! I've already healed a lot of people? I suppose...

|vo_10_01_title      = {name}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies (1.0).ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = The smiles on the faces of the people I've helped keeps me going.
|vo_10_02_title      = {name}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles (1.0).ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = My companions keep getting injured, but I'm unable to share the burden of their pain. The only thing I can do is my absolute very best to heal their wounds! I'll make sure that everyone is healthy.
|vo_10_03_title      = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food (1.0).ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = Do you like spicy dried fish? I have two in my bag. Here, have one!
|vo_10_04_title      = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food (1.0).ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = I don't like anything bitter, especially... ugh, bitter gourd.

|vo_11_01_title      = Birthday
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday (1.0).ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = Here you go! This is the gift I got for your birthday, along with my exclusive autograph! Hehe, when my next song comes out, I'll make sure you're the first one to hear it! Happy birthday!

|vo_12_01_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 01 (1.0).ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = A dance from Barbara, to bring you more healing!
|vo_12_02_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_12_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 02 (1.0).ogg
|vo_12_02_tx         = Aw, thank you so much for your support! Oh no, I'm too excited, my heart just can't stop racing!
|vo_12_03_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_12_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 03 (1.0).ogg
|vo_12_03_tx         = Please, tell me how I can be stronger! Just leave it up to you? No, no, that won't do! I want to help too!
|vo_12_04_title      = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension - 04 (1.0).ogg
|vo_12_04_tx         = Traveling with you, I have discovered that the world is my stage! Thank you so much! *giggles* Ok! Let's shout it one more time! Three, two, one &mdash; Go Barbara, go!
}}
